member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the dummy root node to which all other nodes are added. The list of child nodes of the dummy root node is returned by the GetXmlNodes function.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.InitNamespace(Text)
member.summary: Sets the NamespaceUri that is later used in the functions which create XML nodes.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.AddNewXmlNode(Text,Text)
member.summary: Adds the child node to the current node and sets that child node as a parent for the next nodes.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.AppendXmlNode(Text,Text)
member.summary: Adds the child node to the current node. Node is not added if the content is empty.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.AppendXmlNodeEmptyContentAllowed(Text,Text)
member.summary: Adds the child node to the current node. Node content can be empty.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.FinalizeXmlNode
member.summary: Selects the parent node of the current node, i.e. "closes" the current XML node.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Xml Helper SAF-T Public.GetXmlNodes:XmlNodeList
member.summary: Returns the list of child nodes of the dummy root node.

member.name: M:Interface::XmlDataHandlingSAFT.GetHeaderModificationAllowed(Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@)
member.summary: Defines if the child nodes of the Header node can be modified/removed or other child nodes can be added.
member.param: Defines if other nodes can be added before the specific node.
Defines if other nodes can be added after the specific node.
Defines if child nodes can be added to the specific node.
Defines if the name and value of the specific node can be modified.
Defines if the specific node can be removed.

member.name: M:Interface::XmlDataHandlingSAFT.GetNodeModificationAllowed(Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Type,Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@,Boolean@)
member.summary: Defines if the child nodes of the MasterFiles node can be modified/removed or other child nodes can be added. The function is used to enchance the performance of the export process by allowing the specific modifications of the specific nodes.
member.param: The type of the data which defines the node name, for example Customers, Suppliers, Products, etc.
Defines if other nodes can be added before the specific node.
Defines if other nodes can be added after the specific node.
Defines if child nodes can be added to the specific node.
Defines if the name and value of the specific node can be modified.
Defines if the specific node can be removed.

member.summary: Returns the list of the nodes which should be added before the selected node.
member.param: The RecordRef of the record which is exported at the moment.
The XPath of the selected node.
The namespace URI of the nodes to add.
The optional parameters that can be used to pass additional information to the implementation.
